Reviews.Title: “Basic hotel”

Reviews.Content: convenient walking distance hotel basic neat tidy love drinks provide common hot chocolate day especially winter time dont thin wall hear door cant bare

Reviews.Title: “Basic and bare bones hotel”
Reviews.Author: Romuluz75
Reviews.Content: guest 11 days business trip hotel preferred due location meeting theres subway station stones throw mediumsized shopping mall mcdonalds street found clean amenities maintained found pillows soft result coffee facilities sachets tea instant coffee hot water kettle comes didnt breakfast buffet pretty below average waiting staff cold tables shared strangers due overcrowding morning basic breakfast items fried eggs bacon sausages specially forget quality food poor unpalatable

Reviews.Title: “Good Place to Stay on Berlin's West Side”
Reviews.Author: BmoreTrav
Reviews.Content: visiting berlin night stay parking internet rates isnt bad didnt realize late hotel nice modern design staff friendly helpful internet free flow written breakfast plentiful wide selection comfortable modern clean fresh bathroom nice spacious curtained window looked courtyard below people below odd bathroom condiments western offered wide array shampoo conditioner body wash etc western premier hotel wall mounted wash dispensers kinda disappointing supposed amongst chains parking parking available block street parking garage drive bring ticket 650 euros inconvenient youd designed building parking bit irritated situation decided worry returned cruise berlin doing city returned hotel 11pm found plenty street parking formerly occupied office workers surrounding buildings parking easy free overall liked hotel probably stay

Reviews.Title: “Don't look any further in the Alt-Tegel vicinity”
Reviews.Author: TerryWrist
Reviews.Content: district city business didnt regret choosing hotel easily accessible car plenty parking space shopping center door 5 euro flat fee matter stay breakfast include buffet madetoorder items extra charge free internet access lobby insulated quiet location hotel subway station easy sights city
